block.tiletools.frozen_tile.name: Frozen Block
message.tiletools.bottle_info1: Picks up blocks (including machines!) for moving or just storing.
message.tiletools.bottle_info2: Craft with a pickaxe to upgrade the tier. Higher tiers can pick up more blocks and recharge faster.
message.tiletools.wand_info1: Speeds up crops and machines when shift right clicked, at the cost of some durability.
message.tiletools.wand_info2: While this item never breaks, overusing it is bad for your health.
message.tiletools.melter_info2: It's still not as fast as properly unfreezing it.
message.tiletools.portable_freezer_info1: Portable version of the block freezer.
message.tiletools.portable_freezer_info2: Sadly, it's too strong and blocks frozen by it can't be used very well.
message.tiletools.growth_accelerator_inf: Speeds up the growth of crops planted on the block above it.
message.tiletools.redstone_disable: A redstone signal disables this block.
message.tiletools.protect_te_info: Tools with this enchantment won't break machines unless you're sneaking.
